1: -module(eep48_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("kernel/include/eep48.hrl").
    6: 
    7: %% Test server callbacks
    8: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
    9: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   10: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   11: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   12: 
   13: %% Test cases
   14: -export([edoc_app_should_pass_shell_docs_validation/1,
   15: 	 module_anno/1,
   16: 	 function_anno/1,
   17: 	 type_anno/1,
   18: 	 cb_anno/1,
   19: 	 function_since_tag/1,
   20: 	 function_deprecated_tag/1,
   21: 	 type_since_tag/1,
   22: 	 type_deprecated_tag/1,
   23: 	 cb_since_tag/1,
   24: 	 cb_deprecated_tag/1,
   25: 	 links/1,
   26: 	 see_tags_grouped_together/1,
   27: 	 equiv/1,
   28: 	 f_sig_single_simple_clause/1,
   29: 	 f_sig_single_simple_clause_with_spec/1,
   30: 	 f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses/1,
   31: 	 f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses_with_spec/1,
   32: 	 f_sig_single_record_clause/1,
   33: 	 f_sig_single_record_clause_with_spec/1,
   34: 	 f_sig_multiple_record_clauses/1,
   35: 	 f_sig_multiple_record_clauses_with_spec/1,
   36: 	 f_spec_type_without_name/1,
   37: 	 f_spec_types_mixed/1,
   38: 	 f_spec_with_multiple_clauses/1,
   39: 	 f_spec_with_multiple_clauses_one_fun_clause/1,
   40: 	 f_spec_lhs_match_expr/1,
   41: 	 f_spec_rhs_match_expr/1,
   42: 	 f_spec_unnamed_pattern/1,
   43: 	 f_spec_bounded_single_clause_fun/1,
   44: 	 f_spec_bounded_multiple_clause_fun/1,
   45: 	 f_spec_bounded_singleton_atom/1,
   46: 	 f_spec_bounded_singleton_int/1,
   47: 	 f_spec_rettype_constraint/1,
   48: 	 f_spec_indirect_constraint/1,
   49: 	 f_spec_arg_type_in_retval/1,
   50: 	 f_redundant_spec/1,
   51: 	 f_only_attr/1,
   52: 	 f_only_tag/1,
   53: 	 f_prefixed_spec/1,
   54: 	 t_only_attr/1,
   55: 	 t_only_tag/1,
   56: 	 t_redundant/1]).
   57: 
   58: -define(a2b(A), atom_to_binary(A, utf8)).
   59: -define(io2b(IO), iolist_to_binary(IO)).
   60: 
   61: %%
   62: %% CT preamble
   63: %%
   64: 
   65: suite() -> [].
   66: 
   67: all() -> [edoc_app_should_pass_shell_docs_validation,
   68: 	  module_anno,
   69: 	  function_anno,
   70: 	  type_anno,
   71: 	  cb_anno,
   72: 	  function_since_tag,
   73: 	  function_deprecated_tag,
   74: 	  type_since_tag,
   75: 	  type_deprecated_tag,
   76: 	  cb_since_tag,
   77: 	  cb_deprecated_tag,
   78: 	  links,
   79: 	  see_tags_grouped_together,
   80: 	  equiv,
   81: 	  f_sig_single_simple_clause,
   82: 	  f_sig_single_simple_clause_with_spec,
   83: 	  f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses,
   84: 	  f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses_with_spec,
   85: 	  f_sig_single_record_clause,
   86: 	  f_sig_single_record_clause_with_spec,
   87: 	  f_sig_multiple_record_clauses,
   88: 	  f_sig_multiple_record_clauses_with_spec,
   89: 	  f_spec_type_without_name,
   90: 	  f_spec_types_mixed,
   91: 	  f_spec_with_multiple_clauses,
   92: 	  f_spec_with_multiple_clauses_one_fun_clause,
   93: 	  f_spec_lhs_match_expr,
   94: 	  f_spec_rhs_match_expr,
   95: 	  f_spec_unnamed_pattern,
   96: 	  f_spec_bounded_single_clause_fun,
   97: 	  f_spec_bounded_multiple_clause_fun,
   98: 	  f_spec_bounded_singleton_atom,
   99: 	  f_spec_bounded_singleton_int,
  100: 	  f_spec_rettype_constraint,
  101: 	  f_spec_indirect_constraint,
  102: 	  f_spec_arg_type_in_retval,
  103: 	  f_redundant_spec,
  104: 	  f_only_attr,
  105: 	  f_only_tag,
  106: 	  f_prefixed_spec,
  107: 	  t_only_attr,
  108: 	  t_only_tag,
  109: 	  t_redundant].
  110: 
  111: %% TODO: remove these cases once EDoc supports extracting the relevant tags
  112: not_supported() -> [type_since_tag,
  113: 		    type_deprecated_tag,
  114: 		    cb_since_tag,
  115: 		    cb_deprecated_tag].
  116: 
  117: groups() -> [].
  118: 
  119: init_per_suite(Config) -> Config.
  120: end_per_suite(_Config) -> ok.
  121: 
  122: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) -> Config.
  123: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) -> ok.
  124: 
  125: init_per_testcase(edoc_app_should_pass_shell_docs_validation = _CaseName, Config) ->
  126:     case test_server:is_cover() of
  127:         true ->
  128:             {skip,"Test fails when cover compiled"};
  129:         false ->
  130:             {ok, #{ebin := EbinDir} = CopyInfo} =
  131:                 copy_application(edoc, ?config(priv_dir, Config)),
  132:             true = code:add_patha(EbinDir),
  133:             [{edoc_copy, CopyInfo} | Config]
  134:     end;
  135: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  136:     case lists:member(CaseName, not_supported()) of
  137: 	true ->
  138: 	    {skip, "not supported"};
  139: 	false ->
  140: 	    Config
  141:     end.
  142: 
  143: end_per_testcase(edoc_app_should_pass_shell_docs_validation = _CaseName, Config) ->
  144:     #{ebin := EbinDir} = ?config(edoc_copy, Config),
  145:     true = code:del_path(EbinDir),
  146:     Config;
  147: end_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) -> Config.
  148: 
  149: %%
  150: %% Tests
  151: %%
  152: 
  153: edoc_app_should_pass_shell_docs_validation(_Config) ->
  154:     ok = edoc:application(edoc, [{doclet, edoc_doclet_chunks},
  155: 				 {layout, edoc_layout_chunks},
  156: 				 private, hidden]),
  157:     ok = application:load(edoc),
  158:     {ok, Modules} = application:get_key(edoc, modules),
  159:     [ shell_docs:validate(M) || M <- Modules ].
  160: 
  161: module_anno(Config) ->
  162:     Docs = #docs_v1{} = get_chunk(Config, eep48_meta),
  163:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  164:     ?assertEqual([{file, "eep48_meta.erl"}, {location, 1}],
  165: 		 Docs#docs_v1.anno).
  166: 
  167: function_anno(Config) ->
  168:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  169:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  170:     ?assertEqual([{file, "eep48_meta.erl"}, {location, 35}],
  171: 		 get_anno(function, fun_with_since_tag, 0, Docs)).
  172: 
  173: type_anno(Config) ->
  174:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  175:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  176:     ?assertEqual([{file, "eep48_meta.erl"}, {location, 22}],
  177: 		 get_anno(type, type_with_since_tag, 0, Docs)).
  178: 
  179: cb_anno(Config) ->
  180:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  181:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  182:     ?assertEqual([{file, "eep48_meta.erl"}, {location, 28}],
  183: 		 get_anno(callback, cb_with_since_tag, 0, Docs)).
  184: 
  185: function_since_tag(Config) ->
  186:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  187:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  188:     ?assertEqual(<<"0.1.0">>, get_function_meta_field(since, fun_with_since_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  189: 
  190: function_deprecated_tag(Config) ->
  191:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  192:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  193:     ?assertEqual(<<"Deprecated function.">>,
  194: 		 get_function_meta_field(deprecated, fun_with_deprecated_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  195: 
  196: type_since_tag(Config) ->
  197:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  198:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  199:     ?assertEqual(<<"0.1.0">>, get_type_meta_field(since, type_with_since_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  200: 
  201: type_deprecated_tag(Config) ->
  202:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  203:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  204:     ?assertEqual(<<"Deprecated type.">>,
  205: 		 get_type_meta_field(deprecated, type_with_deprecated_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  206: 
  207: cb_since_tag(Config) ->
  208:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  209:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  210:     ?assertEqual(<<"0.1.0">>,
  211: 		 get_callback_meta_field(since, cb_with_since_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  212: 
  213: cb_deprecated_tag(Config) ->
  214:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  215:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  216:     ?assertEqual(<<"Deprecated callback.">>,
  217: 		 get_callback_meta_field(deprecated, cb_with_deprecated_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  218: 
  219: links(Config) ->
  220:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_links),
  221:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  222:     ?assertEqual({<<"seeerl">>, <<"eep48_links">>},
  223: 		 get_doc_link({function, module_link, 0}, Docs)),
  224:     ?assertEqual({<<"seeapp">>, <<"edoc:index">>},
  225: 		 get_doc_link({function, app_link, 0}, Docs)),
  226:     ?assertEqual({<<"seeerl">>, <<"edoc:edoc_doclet">>},
  227: 		 get_doc_link({function, app_module_link, 0}, Docs)),
  228:     ?assertEqual({<<"seemfa">>, <<"edoc:edoc#files/2">>},
  229: 		 get_doc_link({function, app_mfa_link, 0}, Docs)),
  230:     ?assertEqual({<<"seemfa">>, <<"eep48_SUITE#suite/0">>},
  231: 		 get_doc_link({function, external_function_link, 0}, Docs)),
  232:     ?assertEqual({<<"seemfa">>, <<"#f/0">>},
  233: 		 get_doc_link({function, local_function_link, 0}, Docs)),
  234:     ?assertEqual({<<"seetype">>, <<"#t/0">>},
  235: 		 get_doc_link({function, local_type_link, 0}, Docs)),
  236:     ?assertEqual({<<"seetype">>, <<"eep48_links#t/0">>},
  237: 		 get_doc_link({function, external_type_link, 0}, Docs)).
  238: 
  239: see_tags_grouped_together(Config) ->
  240:     Docs = get_chunk(Config, eep48_links),
  241:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  242:     ?assertEqual( <<"See also: equiv_target/1, fun_with_equiv_doc_and_see/1.\n">>,
  243: 		  ?io2b(string:find(shell_docs:render(eep48_links, ?FUNCTION_NAME, Docs),
  244: 				    "See also")) ).
  245: 
  246: equiv(Config) ->
  247:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_links),
  248:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  249:     ?assertMatch(<<"Equivalent to equiv_target(ok).">>,
  250: 		 get_flat_doc({function, fun_with_equiv_tag, 0}, Docs)),
  251:     ?assertMatch(<<"Equivalent to {<<\"arbitrary\">>, erlang, \"term\"}.">>,
  252: 		 get_flat_doc({function, fun_with_non_call_equiv_tag, 0}, Docs)).
  253: 
  254: f_sig_single_simple_clause(Config) ->
  255:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  256:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  257:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_single_simple_clause(Arg)">>],
  258: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  259: 
  260: f_sig_single_simple_clause_with_spec(Config) ->
  261:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  262:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  263:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_single_simple_clause_with_spec(Arg)">>],
  264: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  265: 
  266: f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses(Config) ->
  267:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  268:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  269:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses(C1A1,">>, <<"C1A2)">>],
  270: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs)).
  271: 
  272: f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses_with_spec(Config) ->
  273:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  274:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  275:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses_with_spec(C1A1,">>, <<"C1A2)">>],
  276: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs)).
  277: 
  278: f_sig_single_record_clause(Config) ->
  279:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  280:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  281:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_single_record_clause(R)">>],
  282: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  283: 
  284: f_sig_single_record_clause_with_spec(Config) ->
  285:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  286:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  287:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_single_record_clause_with_spec(R)">>],
  288: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  289: 
  290: f_sig_multiple_record_clauses(Config) ->
  291:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  292:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  293:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_multiple_record_clauses(R)">>],
  294: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  295: 
  296: f_sig_multiple_record_clauses_with_spec(Config) ->
  297:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  298:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  299:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_multiple_record_clauses_with_spec(R)">>],
  300: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  301: 
  302: f_spec_type_without_name(Config) ->
  303:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  304:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  305:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_type_without_name(Arg :: atom()) -> ok.\n">>,
  306: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs) ).
  307: 
  308: f_spec_types_mixed(Config) ->
  309:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  310:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  311:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_types_mixed(Arg1 :: my_type(), Arg2 :: tuple()) -> ok.\n">>,
  312: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  313: 
  314: f_spec_with_multiple_clauses(Config) ->
  315:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  316:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  317:     ct:pal("EDoc repeats the first clause's param names for all clauses. "
  318: 	   "The actual param names are `(A1, A2); (S, I)'.", []),
  319:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_with_multiple_clauses(A1 :: my_type(), A2 :: atom()) ->\n"
  320: 		    "                                      atoms;\n"
  321: 		    "                                  (A1 :: string(), A2 :: integer()) ->\n"
  322: 		    "                                      not_atoms.\n">>,
  323: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  324: 
  325: f_spec_with_multiple_clauses_one_fun_clause(Config) ->
  326:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  327:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  328:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_with_multiple_clauses_one_fun_clause(A1 :: my_type(),\n"
  329: 		    "                                                  A2 :: atom()) ->\n"
  330: 		    "                                                     atoms;\n"
  331: 		    "                                                 (A1 :: string(),\n"
  332: 		    "                                                  A2 :: integer()) ->\n"
  333: 		    "                                                     not_atoms.\n">>,
  334: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  335: 
  336: f_spec_lhs_match_expr(Config) ->
  337:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  338:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  339:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_lhs_match_expr(Pattern :: any()) -> ok.\n">>,
  340: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs) ).
  341: 
  342: f_spec_rhs_match_expr(Config) ->
  343:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  344:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  345:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_rhs_match_expr(Pattern :: any()) -> ok.\n">>,
  346: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs) ).
  347: 
  348: f_spec_unnamed_pattern(Config) ->
  349:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  350:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  351:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_unnamed_pattern(_ :: any()) -> ok.\n">>,
  352: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs) ).
  353: 
  354: f_spec_bounded_single_clause_fun(Config) ->
  355:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  356:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  357:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_bounded_single_clause_fun(A, T, S, I) -> ok\n"
  358: 		    "                                          when\n"
  359: 		    "                                              A :: my_type(),\n"
  360: 		    "                                              T :: tuple(),\n"
  361: 		    "                                              S :: string(),\n"
  362: 		    "                                              I :: integer().\n">>,
  363: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 4}, Docs) ).
  364: 
  365: f_spec_bounded_multiple_clause_fun(Config) ->
  366:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  367:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  368:     ct:pal("TODO: This expectation is buggy: the actual param names are `(A1, A2, A3, A4)', "
  369: 	   "but EDoc infers them to be `(A1, A2, A3, I)'.", []),
  370:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_bounded_multiple_clause_fun(A1, A2, A3, I) -> ok\n"
  371: 		    "                                            when\n"
  372: 		    "                                                A1 :: my_type(),\n"
  373: 		    "                                                A2 :: tuple(),\n"
  374: 		    "                                                A3 :: string(),\n"
  375: 		    "                                                I :: integer();\n"
  376: 		    "                                        (A1, A2, A3, A) -> ok\n"
  377: 		    "                                            when\n"
  378: 		    "                                                A1 :: string(),\n"
  379: 		    "                                                A2 :: integer(),\n"
  380: 		    "                                                A3 :: list(),\n"
  381: 		    "                                                A :: atom().\n">>,
  382: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 4}, Docs) ).
  383: 
  384: f_spec_bounded_singleton_atom(Config) ->
  385:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  386:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  387:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_bounded_singleton_atom(I, a) -> ok when I :: integer().\n">>,
  388: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  389: 
  390: f_spec_bounded_singleton_int(Config) ->
  391:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  392:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  393:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_bounded_singleton_int(I, 1) -> ok when I :: integer().\n">>,
  394: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  395: 
  396: f_spec_rettype_constraint(Config) ->
  397:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  398:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  399:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_rettype_constraint() -> R when R :: atom().\n">>,
  400: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  401: 
  402: f_spec_indirect_constraint(Config) ->
  403:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  404:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  405:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_indirect_constraint(A, B) -> ok when B :: [A].\n">>,
  406: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  407: 
  408: f_spec_arg_type_in_retval(Config) ->
  409:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  410:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  411:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_arg_type_in_retval(A, B) -> [A] when B :: atom().\n">>,
  412: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  413: 
  414: f_redundant_spec(Config) ->
  415:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  416:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  417:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_redundant_spec() -> atom().\n">>,
  418:                   get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  419:     ?assertMatch( <<"Function with a redundant spec.">>,
  420: 		  get_flat_doc({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  421: 
  422: f_only_attr(Config) ->
  423:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  424:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  425:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_only_attr() -> atom().\n">>,
  426:                   get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  427:     ?assertMatch( <<"Function with only a spec attribute.">>,
  428: 		  get_flat_doc({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  429: 
  430: f_only_tag(Config) ->
  431:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  432:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  433:     ?assertException(error, {badkey, signature},
  434: 		     get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  435:     ?assertMatch( <<"Function with only a spec tag.">>,
  436: 		  get_flat_doc({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  437: 
  438: f_prefixed_spec(Config) ->
  439:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  440:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  441:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec eep48_redundant:f_prefixed_spec() -> any().\n">>,
  442: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  443: 
  444: t_only_attr(Config) ->
  445:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  446:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  447:     ?assertEqual( <<"-type t_only_attr() :: any().\n">>,
  448: 		  get_pp_spec({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  449:     ?assertEqual( <<"Type t_only_attr defined with an attribute.">>,
  450: 		  get_flat_doc({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  451: 
  452: t_only_tag(Config) ->
  453:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  454:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  455:     ?assertException(error, {badkey, signature},
  456: 		     get_pp_spec({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  457:     ?assertEqual( <<"Type t_only_tag defined with a tag.">>,
  458: 		  get_flat_doc({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  459: 
  460: t_redundant(Config) ->
  461:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  462:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  463:     ?assertEqual( <<"-type t_redundant() :: any().\n">>,
  464: 		  get_pp_spec({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  465:     ?assertEqual( <<"Type t_redundant defined with an attribute, redundant with a tag.">>,
  466: 		  get_flat_doc({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  467: 
  468: %%
  469: %% Helpers
  470: %%
  471: 
  472: get_chunk(Config, M) ->
  473:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  474:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  475:     {ok, Chunk} = get_doc_chunk(DataDir, PrivDir, M),
  476:     Chunk.
  477: 
  478: get_docs(Config, M) ->
  479:     Chunk = get_chunk(Config, M),
  480:     Chunk#docs_v1.docs.
  481: 
  482: get_function_meta_field(Field, F, A, Docs) ->
  483:     get_meta_field(Field, function, F, A, Docs).
  484: 
  485: get_type_meta_field(Field, T, A, Docs) ->
  486:     get_meta_field(Field, type, T, A, Docs).
  487: 
  488: get_callback_meta_field(Field, Cb, A, Docs) ->
  489:     get_meta_field(Field, callback, Cb, A, Docs).
  490: 
  491: get_meta_field(Field, Kind, Name, Arity, Docs) ->
  492:     Meta = get_metadata(lookup_entry(Kind, Name, Arity, Docs)),
  493:     maps:get(Field, Meta).
  494: 
  495: get_doc_chunk(DataDir, PrivDir, Mod) ->
  496:     TagsErl = filename:join([DataDir, atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".erl"]),
  497:     edoc:files([TagsErl], [{doclet, edoc_doclet_chunks},
  498: 			   {layout, edoc_layout_chunks},
  499: 			   {dir, PrivDir}]),
  500:     TagsChunk = filename:join([PrivDir, "chunks", atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".chunk"]),
  501:     {ok, BChunk} = file:read_file(TagsChunk),
  502:     Chunk = binary_to_term(BChunk),
  503:     {ok, Chunk}.
  504: 
  505: lookup_entry(Kind, Function, Arity, Docs) ->
  506:     [Entry] = lists:filter(fun({{K, F, A},_Anno,_Sig,_Doc,_Meta})
  507: 				 when K =:= Kind andalso F =:= Function, A =:= Arity ->
  508: 				   true;
  509: 			      (_) ->
  510: 				   false
  511: 			   end, Docs),
  512:     Entry.
  513: 
  514: get_metadata({_, _, _, _, Metadata}) -> Metadata.
  515: 
  516: get_doc_link(KNA, Docs) ->
  517:     [Link] = [ Node || {a, _, _} = Node <- get_doc(KNA, Docs) ],
  518:     {a, Attrs, _} = Link,
  519:     <<"https://erlang.org/doc/link/", ShortRel/bytes>> = fetch(rel, Attrs),
  520:     {ShortRel, fetch(href, Attrs)}.
  521: 
  522: get_anno(Kind, Name, Arity, Docs) ->
  523:     {_, Anno, _, _, _} = lookup_entry(Kind, Name, Arity, Docs),
  524:     Anno.
  525: 
  526: fetch(K, List) ->
  527:     case lists:keyfind(K, 1, List) of
  528: 	false -> erlang:error({not_found, K, List});
  529: 	{K, V} -> V
  530:     end.
  531: 
  532: get_flat_doc(KNA, Docs) ->
  533:     flatten_doc(get_doc(KNA, Docs)).
  534: 
  535: get_sig({K, N, A}, Docs) ->
  536:     Entry = docs_v1_entry(lookup_entry(K, N, A, Docs)),
  537:     Entry#docs_v1_entry.signature.
  538: 
  539: get_pp_spec({K, N, A}, Docs) ->
  540:     [Spec] = get_meta_field(signature, K, N, A, Docs),
  541:     iolist_to_binary(erl_pp:attribute(Spec)).
  542: 
  543: flatten_doc(XML) ->
  544:     iolist_to_binary(lists:reverse(xmerl_lib:foldxml(fun flatten_xml/2, [], XML))).
  545: 
  546: flatten_xml(T, Acc) when is_binary(T) -> [T | Acc];
  547: flatten_xml({_, _, XML}, Acc) -> xmerl_lib:foldxml(fun flatten_xml/2, Acc, XML).
  548: 
  549: get_doc({K, N, A}, Docs) ->
  550:     Entry = docs_v1_entry(lookup_entry(K, N, A, Docs)),
  551:     maps:get(<<"en">>, Entry#docs_v1_entry.doc).
  552: 
  553: copy_application(_App, undefined) ->
  554:     ct:fail("~s: target dir undefined", [?FUNCTION_NAME]);
  555: copy_application(App, TargetDir) ->
  556:     DocDir	= filename:join([TargetDir, App, "doc"]),
  557:     EbinDir	= filename:join([TargetDir, App, "ebin"]),
  558:     IncludeDir	= filename:join([TargetDir, App, "include"]),
  559:     SrcDir	= filename:join([TargetDir, App, "src"]),
  560:     ok = file:make_dir(filename:join([TargetDir, App])),
  561:     ok = file:make_dir(DocDir),
  562:     ok = file:make_dir(EbinDir),
  563:     ok = file:make_dir(IncludeDir),
  564:     ok = file:make_dir(SrcDir),
  565:     copy_app_dir(App, ebin, EbinDir),
  566:     copy_app_dir(App, include, IncludeDir),
  567:     copy_app_dir(App, src, SrcDir),
  568:     {ok, #{ebin => EbinDir, doc => DocDir, src => SrcDir}}.
  569: 
  570: copy_app_dir(App, Dir, TargetDir) ->
  571:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(code:lib_dir(App, Dir)),
  572:     lists:foreach(fun (F) ->
  573: 			  file:copy(filename:join(code:lib_dir(App, Dir), F),
  574: 				    filename:join(TargetDir, F))
  575: 		  end, Files).
  576: 
  577: docs_v1_entry({KNA, Anno, Sig, Doc, Meta}) ->
  578:     #docs_v1_entry{kind_name_arity = KNA,
  579: 		   anno = Anno,
  580: 		   signature = Sig,
  581: 		   doc = Doc,
  582: 		   metadata = Meta}.
